name: Haunting Melody
description:
Haunting Melody is a short 2d rhythm platformer game filled with story and secrets. Escape a strange place while trying to understand the story of someone that was here  before you.

Headphones/Speaker/Some audio output device recommended.

This game was made in 2 weeks for the GDKO Round 2 Game Jam.

All art, music, and code was made by me.
